description.en:
### Fleeting Beauties
You might have missed your shot at the woman who captivated your heart, but fate has intervened and thrown you a second chance! Whether it’s a nun's temptations that are outweighing her godly duties, a childhood friend who's back on the market, or even a neglected milf who isn't getting the loving she deserves at home, it’s time to make your move. Love is fleeting and these sultry, juicy babes are begging you to take action!

Fleeting Beauties is a certified classic from utu, a connoisseur of all things shameful and sexy. With plump butts, full lips, ample tits, and thick bodies, utu's heroines heat up in hot ecstasy. And the more immoral the act, the more intense the passion burns! Overloaded with twelve lovely chapters, Fleeting Beauties is a catch that's worth keeping and never giving up!

1. Estrus Love / Hatsujou Renai (発情恋愛); Comic Kairaku-ten 2014-06
2. VG&SF / DT to SF (DTとSF); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2014-10
3. Feeling Kidnapped / Sarawaregokochi (さらわれごこち); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2015-06
4. Love Me Sister / Aishite! Sister (愛してッ！シスター); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2014-05
5. Living with Sakura / Sakura Toiki (サクラ・トイキ); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2015-04
6. Underneath Toumi's Big Tree / Toumi no Ooki na Ki no Shita de (桃御の大きな樹の下で); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2014-08
7. Cleaners Mischievous Tailoring / Cleaning no Itazura Shitate (クリーニングのいたずら仕立て); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2014-12
8. Science Together / Issho ni Science (いっしょにサイエンス); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2015-02
9. Toilet no Megami-sama (トイレの女神さま); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2013-02
10. Flame-Colored Memory / Omoide Hiiro (おもいでひいろ); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2011-12
11. Suspicion & Attraction / Giwaku to Miwaku (ギワクとミワク); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2012-09
12. Their Toy / Futari no Omocha (ふたりのオモチャ); Comic Shitsuraku-ten 2012-12
